title: tour: hyperlinks are not obvious
body:
Context: http://127.0.0.1:3999/flowcontrol/13

Hi, just going through the Golang tour (very cool, btw) and was confused by the sentence "To learn more about defer statements read this blog post." because there was no link to a blog post. Then I realized that "blog post" was an undecorated link. It would be clearer if the link were underlined or somehow called out.
